hero.subtitle: Transform your product specs into persuasive copy that converts visitors into customers. Let ProductGenie grant your ecommerce wishes with powerful, SEO-rich descriptions.

styleConfiguration.title: Choose Your Genie's Magic Style
styleConfiguration.description: Configure the magical voice and platform style that ProductGenie will use for all your products.
styleConfiguration.brandVoiceDescription: The personality and voice for all your product descriptions
styleConfiguration.platformStyleDescription: Platform-specific writing style for all descriptions

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Select a magical voice and platform style to see how ProductGenie transforms your product descriptions. Add products below to grant your ecommerce wishes!
getStarted.addProducts: Add products manually below or upload a CSV file to let ProductGenie work its magic!

productWishlist.title: Your Product Wishlist
productWishlist.emptyDescription: Add products above to make your wishes come true.

inputMethods.uploadMoreDescription: Add more products to your existing catalog.
inputMethods.addMoreDescription: Add individual products to your existing batch.

choiceCards.title: Add Products to Your Wishlist
choiceCards.subtitle: Choose how you'd like to add products for ProductGenie to work its magic

csvUpload.title: Upload Your Wishlist
csvUpload.description: Perfect for scaling your catalog quickly. Upload your product data and let ProductGenie grant all your wishes at once.

smartProcessing.title: Smart CSV Processing:
smartProcessing.description: Automatically detects product names and categories from your CSV headers

manualEntry.title: Add Individual Wishes
manualEntry.description: Ideal for testing different magical styles and adding products one by one with precision.

choiceCards.helpText: You can always add more products later using the other method

languageSelector.label: Output Language
languageSelector.description: Select the language for generated descriptions

batchLanguageSelector.label: Generate descriptions in:
batchLanguageSelector.description: Language for all descriptions in this batch

results.descriptionsGenerated: descriptions generated. Edit below and export your results.
